description:
Kajika, Lee-Leng, and Sezun have entered the palace in order to rescue Eugene and Noei. Disguised as tailors, they reunite with Eugene. Lee-Leng leaves Kajika with Eugene in order to head to the jail cell where Noei is held captive. Lee-Leng was able to rescue Noei with the help of the priest, though on the way to meeting up with Kajika, they come face to face with the guards. On the other hand, danger is approaching Kajika and Eugene, who are waiting for Lee-Leng’s arrival.
Source: crunchyroll
